pli-tv-pvr2.1:2.17: Sp 5.2: Nidānogadhanti “yassa siyā āpatti so āvikareyyā”ti ettha sabbāpattīnaṁ anupaviṭṭhattā nidānogadhaṁ; nidāne anupaviṭṭhanti attho, “Nidānogadha: it is contained in the introduction because of the entry here of all offences: ‘Anyone who has committed an offense should reveal it.’ The meaning is they are entered in the introduction.”
